## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7d529d0ab1e104b0efc7fe5f691e984d58e2f5b08fc910ed462ba8be72b852e9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'eslint-plugin-fuel-react' @ 1.0.1 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
